mapper.select: select b.P_ID as pId, itemId, isbn, title, description, translator, author, priceStandard, coverSmallUrl, coverLargeUrl, categoryId, categoryName, publisher, pubDate, `index`, authorInfo, sellCount, stock, saleRate, salePrice, realPrice, regDate, sellState, display,file_nm, file_loc, file_size , serviceType,mileage,mileageRate, DATE_FORMAT(sellStart, '%Y/%m/%d') as sellStart,DATE_FORMAT(sellEnd, '%Y/%m/%d') as sellEnd, ROUND(avg(rStar),1) as rStar,count(rId) as rCount FROM BOOK_GOODS b left join REVIEW r on b.P_ID = r.P_ID where b.P_ID=#{pId} group by b.P_ID

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P_ID as pId,title,coverLargeUrl,realPrice, saleRate FROM `BOOK_GOODS`
categoryId like CONCAT(#{cateClass}, '__')
categoryId=#{categoryId}
ORDER BY sellCount desc LIMIT 12 ) as A ORDER BY rand()

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P_ID as pId,title,coverLargeUrl,realPrice, saleRate,sellStart,sellEnd,description FROM `BOOK_GOODS` WHERE sellState='y' and sellEnd is not null ORDER BY sellEnd LIMIT 12 ) as A ORDER BY rand() LIMIT 1
SELECT IFNULL(mileage, 0) AS mileage , title , IFNULL(realPrice,0) AS realPrice , coverLargeUrl , P_ID AS pId , itemId FROM BOOK_GOODS WHERE P_ID = #{pId}
